original_text: So the workmen wrought, and the work was perfected by them, and they set the house of God in his state, and strengthened it.
korean_text: 기술자들이 맡아서 수리하는 공사가 점점 진척되므로 하나님의 전을 이전 모양대로 견고하게 하니라

sentences.original_text: and the work was perfected by them
and they set the house of God in his state
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 하나님의 집을 그 상태로 세웠고
